mapper.insert: insert into trip_challenge(trip_challenge_id, trip_challenge_name, start_date, end_date, hits, reward_point) values(trip_seq.nextval,#{tripChallengeName},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{hits},#{rewardPoint})
mapper.update: update trip_challenge trip_challenge_name = #{tripChallengeName}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, limited_people = #{limitedPeople}, hits = #{hits}, reward_point = #{rewardPoint} where trip_challenge_id = #{tripChallengeId}
mapper.select: select trip_challenge_id, prime_rate, trip_challenge_name, start_date, end_date, limited_people, is_delete, challenge_image from trip_challenge where trip_challenge_name like '%' || #{value} || '%'
select trip_challenge_id, trip_challenge_name, start_date, end_date, hits, reward_point, challenge_image from trip_challenge
select trip_challenge_id, trip_challenge_name, start_date, end_date, hits, reward_point, challenge_image from trip_challenge where trip_challenge_id = #{value}
select trip_challenge_id, trip_challenge_name, start_date, trip_challenge_type end_date, hits, reward_point, challenge_image,is_delete from trip_challenge where is_delete = 0
select trip_challenge_id, trip_challenge_name, start_date, trip_challenge_type, end_date, hits, reward_point, challenge_image, is_delete,content from trip_challenge
